abstract: A digest of recent Times articles with implications for those applying to college, now or in the near future.
snippet: A digest of recent Times articles with implications for those applying to college, now or in the near future.
lead_paragraph: In case you missed it, The Times published three important articles over the weekend that should resonate with at least some families applying to college this year, or in the near future.

headline.main: Roundup: Student Aid for Children of Gay Parents; Whither Affirmative Action; Tuition Assistance for Illegal Immigrants
